segments.text: Hi , I want to see the Terra Cotta Warriors in Xi'an . Could you please remind me when we are arriving at that stop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . You took the wrong bus . You need to take Bus 151 which goes the opposite direction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no ! What should I do now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . You can get off at the next stop and walk across the street and take the Bus 151 to the opposite direction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . How many stops do I have to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a long way to go . It is so kind of you to help me . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
